p:testcaseDefinition.p:name: EID_SERVER_A3_01
p:testcaseDefinition.p:description: Positive test verifying that the eID-Server supports the given cipher suite and parameters for TLS on the eID-Interface.
p:testcaseDefinition.p:clientExplanation: Configure the server to accept the certificate chain for client E. This includes the TLS, XML signature and the CV certificate.
